title: Living Aligned with the Heart
description: 2010-02-24 - We suffer when our words or actions arise from unconscious wants and fears.  This talk explores how we can awaken from the habitual ways we cause harm to ourselves and others, and live from our natural intelligence and tender warmth.
content:encoded: 2010-02-24 - We suffer when our words or actions arise from unconscious wants and fears.  This talk explores how we can awaken from the habitual ways we cause harm to ourselves and others, and live from our natural intelligence and tender warmth.
